participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Caring and protective, with a passion for cooking and a creative spirit.
participant_1.background: I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity. I've had to protect myself from bullies, but I'm not a fighter by nature. I enjoy driving my Ford truck to work as a security guard. I like to train dogs. My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and introspective, with a love for creativity in the kitchen and a desire for comfort.
participant_2.background: I prefer to be comfortable and not draw much attention to myself. I love cooking. I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics. I am in love with Adam Levine. I used to want to serve my country, but now I'm happily employed at a bank.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
What kind of food do you like to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of food, but I'm especially good at making comfort food.
Do you have a favorite comfort food?
I love making mac and cheese. It's so easy and delicious!
That sounds delicious! I love mac and cheese!
Me too! I usually make it with a homemade cheese sauce.
That sounds amazing! I'm going to have to try that sometime.
You definitely should! It's so easy to make and it's so delicious.
What other kinds of comfort food do you like to make?
I also love to make chicken noodle soup, chili, and lasagna.
Those all sound delicious! I love chicken noodle soup and lasagna.
Me too! They're both so comforting and delicious.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
